Text: anything but christmas 2012 I am looking for this movie if you have it
thank you so much for the movies you have made my collection almost complete.  Do you happen to have or know where I can get Meet the Santas?  It is the sequel to single santa seeks mrs claus.

I would like to say thank you again and again for the joy and happiness you've giving me (and all of us )through out this/past holidays seasons. 
May you and your family have a wonderful Christmas and New year!
